item.title: Personal Git Server with Gitolite
item.description: Github and Bitbucket are great, however, there may come a time when you wish to set up a personal Git server. There are many reasons for this, you may legally not be permitted to host the repository externally, or you want to have more control over access privileges. Gitolite is here to help remedy this desire, allowing you to simply set up Git hosting on a central server with fine-grained access control capabilities.
